title: Did Adrian Martinez make the right move?
text:
Adrian Martinez started out his collegiate football career at the University of Nebraska before making the move to Kansas State in his senior year.
```{install.packages(“patchwork”)} library(patchwork) library(waffle) library(ggrepel) library(tidyverse)
m22 <- read_csv(“data/martinez2022.csv”) m21 <- read_csv(“data/martinez2021.csv”) nu <- read_csv(“data/nebraska2022.csv”) kst <- read_csv(“data/kstate2022.csv”)
passing <- ggplot() + geom_line(data=m22, aes(x=Rk, y=PassAtt), color=“purple”) + geom_line(data=m21, aes(x=Rk, y=PassAtt), color = “red”) + scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-1, 40)) + scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:11, labels = paste( 1:11)) + theme_minimal() + labs( x = “Week”, y = “Pass Completion Percentage”, title = “Martinez threw the ball better at Nebraska”, subtitle = “His passes were more consistent prior to moving to the Big 12”, caption = “By: Krystin Collins | Source: https://www.sports-reference.com/cfb/players/adrian-martinez-2.html” ) + theme_minimal() + theme( plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = “bold”), plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10), axis.title = element_text(size = 10), panel.grid.minor = element_blank() )
rushing <- ggplot() + geom_line(data=m22, aes(x=Rk, y=RushAvg), color=“purple”) + geom_line(data=m21, aes(x=Rk, y=RushAvg), color = “red”) + scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-3, 20)) + scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:11, labels = paste( 1:11)) + theme_minimal() + labs( x = “Week”, y = “Rushing Average Yards”, title = “Martinez ran farther while in the Big 12”, subtitle = “He ran for more yards each plan when he was a Wildcat”, caption = “By: Krystin Collins | Source: https://www.sports-reference.com/cfb/players/adrian-martinez-2.html” ) + theme_minimal() + theme( plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = “bold”), plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10), axis.title = element_text(size = 10), panel.grid.minor = element_blank() )
rushing / passing
```

title: About
text: Hi! My name is Krystin Collins and I am currently a senior at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I am double majoring in broadcasting and sports media and communications with a minor in hospitality, restaurant and tourism management. I am currently an intern at HuskerVision. I hope to tell compelling stories through the use of sports data.
